sentence.Network_en: Giant Panda ( Ailuropoda melanoleuca ) is an endangered species that is endemic to China.
sentence.Network_cn: 大熊猫 ( Ailuropodamelanoleuca ) 是我国特有的国家级珍稀濒危保护动物.

sentence.Network_en: Giant panda , Ailuropoda melanoleuca , is a well - known endangered animal , which is distributed only in China.
sentence.Network_cn: 大熊猫(Ailuropodamelanoleuca)是我国特有的濒危物种.

sentence.Network_en: The rabbit anti - giant panda serum was obtained by immunizing rabbit with mixed serum of Ailuropoda melanoleuca.
sentence.Network_cn: 用大熊猫(Ailuropdamelanoleuca) 的混合血清免疫家兔,获得兔抗大熊猫血清.用兔抗大熊猫血清作抗体,分别以黑熊、小熊猫等动物的血清作抗原,进行免疫扩散实验和对流免疫电泳实验.
